item.name:
Add or Update About Section

This endpoint allows you to add or update the About section. If an About section already exists, it updates the existing record; otherwise, it creates a new one.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

body.raw: {"heading":"\"Welcome to Our Company\"","content":"\"Our company was founded to provide exceptional service.\""}

item.name:
Show About Section

This endpoint retrieves the About section information, including cards with images.

Register a new admin.

This endpoint registers a new user with the role of "admin" and returns the user details along with a JWT token upon successful registration.

Admin Login

This endpoint allows an admin user to log in by providing their email and password.
Only users with the "admin" role are authorized to log in using this endpoint.

Get Profile

Retrieves the authenticated Admin's profile.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

Update Admin Profile

Allows the authenticated admin to update their profile information.
The name, email, and password fields are optional, but if provided,
they must meet the specified validation criteria.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login
API to retrieve airline data by its carrier code (IATA code).
API to search for airports based on a query string, which could match IATA code, city, country, state, or airport name.

query.description: The search term (IATA code, city, country, state, or airport name).

item.name:
Upload or Update Banner

This endpoint allows you to upload a new banner or update an existing one. 
Only 3 banners can exist at a time, so no additional banners will be accepted once the limit is reached.
**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

Show All Banners

This endpoint retrieves all existing banners.

Add or Update Card

This endpoint allows you to add a new card or update an existing one based on the `Card_No`. The total number of cards is limited to three.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login
Update or add a product to the cart.

request.description: This endpoint allows authenticated users to add a product to their cart or update an existing product in the cart. If the quantity is set to zero for an existing product, it will be removed from the cart.

item.name: Show the user's cart and update quantities.

request.description: This endpoint returns the contents of the user's cart, including the subtotal, GST amount, and grand total. It also allows updating the quantity of products if provided in the request body.

item.name:
Add a New Client

This endpoint allows you to add a new client with an image. If no URL is provided, it defaults to 'null'.
**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

formdata.description: The URL associated with the client.

item.name:
Update Client 

This endpoint allows you to update an existing client's details or image.
**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

variable.description: The ID of the client to update.

formdata.description: optional The URL associated with the client.

item.name:
Delete Client

This endpoint allows you to delete an existing client by ID.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

variable.description: The ID of the client to delete.

item.name:
Show All Clients

This endpoint retrieves all existing clients.

Add or Update Company Details

This endpoint allows you to add or update the company's details. If company details already exist, the fields become optional; otherwise, they are required for creating a new entry.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

Show Company Details

This endpoint retrieves the existing company details. If no details are found, a message is returned.
API to retrieve a list of all country codes.

API to create a new coupon with specific attributes like code, applicable places, and discount percentage.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

API to update an existing coupon.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

API to delete an existing coupon by coupon code.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login
API to retrieve all available coupons.

Add or update a destination.

This endpoint allows adding a new destination or updating an existing one, depending on whether an ID is provided. 
If the destination already exists (based on the provided ID), it will be updated with the new details.
The endpoint accepts destination details such as name, city, state, images, and more.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

query.description: optional The ID of the destination to be updated. If not provided, a new destination is created.

formdata.description: optional The city of the destination.
optional The state of the destination.
optional The type of the destination.
A short description of the destination.

formdata.value: "Paris is known for its art, fashion, and culture."
formdata.description: A detailed description of the destination.

item.name:
Delete a destination by ID.

This endpoint deletes a destination record based on the provided `id`. 
If the destination with the given ID does not exist, a 404 error is returned. 
On successful deletion, a success message is returned.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

request.description:
This endpoint retrieves all destinations from the database. If no destinations are found, it returns a 404 error.
If destinations are found, it returns a list of destinations along with their details such as name, city, state,
images, description, etc.

This endpoint retrieves all destinations from the database. If no destinations are found, it returns a 404 error.
If destinations are found, it returns a list of destinations along with their details such as name, city, state,
images, description, etc.

This endpoint allows users to search destinations based on the `state` and `destination_type` query parameters.
Both filters are optional. If no matching destinations are found, a 404 error is returned.

{
    "success": 1,
    "Destination": [
        {
            "id": "1",
            "name": "Paris",
            "city": "Paris",
            "state": "Ile-de-France",
            "destination_type": "Tourist",
            "thumbnail_image": "https://link-to-thumbnail-image.com",
            "images": [
                "https://link-to-image1.com",
                "https://link-to-image2.com"
            ],
            "short_description": "The city of lights.",
            "description": "Paris is known for its art, fashion, and culture."
        },
        {
            "id": "2",
            "name": "New York",
            "city": "New York",
            "state": "New York",
            "destination_type": "Urban",
            "thumbnail_image": "https://link-to-thumbnail-image.com",
            "images": [
                "https://link-to-image1.com",
                "https://link-to-image2.com"
            ],
            "short_description": "The city that never sleeps.",
            "description": "New York is known for its skyline, culture, and food."
        }
    ]
}

item.name:
Retrieve unique destination types.

This endpoint returns all unique destination types available in the `Destination` records.
If no destination types are found, a 404 error is returned.

request.description: This endpoint returns a list of all job enquiries, including job title, location, user name, email, phone number, and any notes.

item.name: Add a new enquiry for a job posting.

request.description: This endpoint allows authenticated users to add an enquiry for a specific job posting. Users with a "public" token cannot access this endpoint.

item.name: API to retrieve a list of all IATA codes.
API to check if the provided Origin and Destination any IATA codes is either Domestic or Intrernational if Domestic it will return 0 else 1.

query.description: The IATA code for the origin airport.
The IATA code for the destination airport.

item.name: Job Management
item.description:
**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after User Login

item.name:
Add a new job posting.

This endpoint allows an authenticated employer to add a new job posting. The job details such as title, description, 
short description, duration, location, and additional settings like active, verified, and badge status can be provided.     *

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

body.raw: {"title":"\"Software Engineer\"","description":"\"Looking for a skilled developer...\"","short_description":"\"Develop web applications\"","duration":6,"active":true,"verified":true,"location":"\"New York\"","badge":true}

response.body:
{
    "id": 1,
    "user_id": 10,
    "title": "Software Engineer",
    "description": "Looking for a skilled developer...",
    "short_description": "Develop web applications",
    "duration": 6,
    "active": true,
    "verified": false,
    "location": "New York",
    "badge": true,
    "created_at": "2024-11-14T10:00:00.000000Z",
    "updated_at": "2024-11-14T10:00:00.000000Z"
}

item.name:
Update the active status of a job posting.

This endpoint allows the authenticated user to toggle the active status of a job posting.
The 'active' status is changed from true to false, or vice versa.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

variable.description: The ID of the job posting to update.

response.body:
{
    "job": {
        "id": 1,
        "user_id": 2,
        "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
        "description": "Seeking an experienced developer...",
        "verified": true,
        "active": true,
        "location": "Remote",
        "badge": true,
        "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-01-02T00:00:00Z"
    }
}

item.name:
Update the verified status of a job posting.

This endpoint allows the authenticated user to toggle the verified status of a job posting.
The 'verified' status is changed from true to false, or vice versa.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

variable.description: The ID of the job posting to update.

response.body:
{
   'success': 1,
    "job": {
        "id": 1,
        "user_id": 2,
        "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
        "description": "Seeking an experienced developer...",
        "verified": true,
        "active": true,
        "location": "Remote",
        "badge": true,
        "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-01-02T00:00:00Z"
    }
}

item.name:
Show all Job Postings (Admin)

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

Update an existing job posting.

This endpoint allows the authenticated employer to update an existing job posting by ID. 

Only the fields provided in the request will be updated.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

variable.description: The ID of the job posting to update.

item.name: Search for job postings based on various filter parameters.

query.description: optional Filter by duration (1 for exact match or less than or equal to the given value).

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to search for job postings based on location, duration, and verification status.
Additionally, it checks if the user has applied to the job posting (if the user is authenticated).

response.body:
{
    'success': 0,
    "job": [
        {
            "user_id": 2,
            "gig_id": 1,
            "gigs_title": "Senior Software Engineer",
            "gigs_description": "Seeking an experienced developer...",
            "gigs_Shortdescription": "Join our growing team.",
            "gigs_duration": 6,
            "gigs_location": "Remote",
            "gigs_badge": true,
            "isActive": true,
            "isVerified": true,
            "company_name": "TechCorp",
            "company_image": "https://example.com/company-image.jpg",
            "company_description": "Innovating the future of tech.",
            "isApplied": true
        }
    ]
}

item.name:
Show details for a specific job.

This endpoint retrieves details for a specific job based on the provided job ID.
If the authenticated user is of type 'user', it will check if they have applied for this job.

variable.description: The ID of the job to retrieve.

response.body:
{
    "success": 1,
    "message": "Gigs List",
    "job": {
        "user_id": 10,
        "gig_id": 1,
        "gigs_title": "Web Developer",
        "gigs_description": "We are looking for a skilled Web Developer...",
        "gigs_Shortdescription": "Build responsive websites",
        "gigs_duration": "3 months",
        "isActive": true,
        "isVerified": true,
        "company_name": "By Launcherr",
        "company_image": "https://res.cloudinary.com/douuxmaix/image/upload/v1720553096/jhnimqyeodio3jqgxbp0.jpg",
        "company_description": "",
        "gigs_location": "New York",
        "isApplied": false,
        "gigs_badge": "Top-rated"
    }
}

item.name:
Add or Update Join Offer Section

Adds a new Join Offer section or updates an existing one based on the section name. If the section already exists, it updates the record; otherwise, it creates a new one.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

body.raw: {"section":"\"Discounts\"","heading":"\"Special Discounts for New Members\"","sub_heading":"\"Join now and enjoy exclusive member discounts up to 50%.\""}

item.name:
Retrieve All Join Offer Cards for Admin 

This endpoint retrieves all the Join Offer cards for administrative purposes. It returns all records in the join offers table.
**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

Get Join Offer Sections in a specific manner for front 

Retrieves all Join Offer sections, including the main heading and its associated cards.

The response contains a list of sections, with each section containing its heading and sub-heading. The "MainHeading" section will include additional card details.
API to add a new email address to the newsletter subscription list. A confirmation email is sent upon successful addition.
API to retrieve all email addresses subscribed to the newsletter.

Add a Question and Answer

This endpoint allows you to add a new question and answer pair.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

body.raw: {"Question":"\"What is Laravel?\"","Answer":"\"Laravel is a PHP framework for web artisans.\""}

item.name:
Update a Question and Answer

This endpoint allows you to update an existing question and answer pair.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

variable.description: The ID of the question to update.

body.raw: {"Question":"\"What is Laravel?\"","Answer":"\"Laravel is a PHP framework for web artisans.\""}

item.name:
Delete a Question and Answer

This endpoint deletes a question and answer by its ID.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

variable.description: The ID of the question to delete.

item.name:
Show All Questions and Answers

This endpoint retrieves all the question and answer pairs.
API to add a quiz response. Validates the user input, saves the data, and sends a confirmation email.
API to retrieve all quiz responses. Returns an array of responses.

Add or Update Section

This endpoint adds a new section if it does not exist, or updates it if it does.
- If the `section` already exists, only `heading` and `sub-heading` are optional.
- Otherwise, all fields are required.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

body.raw: {"section":"\"About Us\"","heading":"\"Welcome to Our Company\"","sub-heading":"\"Our mission is to provide...\""}

item.name:
Show All Sections

Retrieves all sections. Returns a 404 error if no sections are found.
API to retrieve a list of all cities, sorted alphabetically.
API to retrieve a list of cities for a specific state.

query.description: The name of the state to filter cities by.

item.name: API to retrieve unique states from the cities data.
API to retrieve a list of all states.

Add or Update a Subscription Card

This endpoint allows you to add a new subscription card or update an existing one based on the `card_no`. 
If the `card_no` already exists, the card is updated; otherwise, a new card is created.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

Show All Subscription Cards (Admin View)

This endpoint retrieves all subscription cards with full details for administrative purposes.

**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after Admin Login

item.name:
Show Subscription Cards for Front 

This endpoint retrieves all subscription cards, formatting the response to include card details such as title, price, optional secondary price, features, and button label.
User Management
item.description:
**Note:** This endpoint requires an `Authorization: Bearer <access_token>` header.

**Note:** You will get the access_token after User Login

request.description:
This endpoint registers a new user with the provided details.
It requires a name, last name, email, and password, validates the input,
and sends an email verification link if the registration is successful.

This endpoint authenticates a user with their email and password.
It validates the credentials, checks if the user is verified, ensures they have the 'user' role,
and returns an access token if successful.

variable.description: The unique code provided to verify the user.

request.description: This endpoint verifies a user using a unique code. If the code is valid, the user's verification status is updated.

item.name: Add or update the user profile.

request.description:
This endpoint allows an authenticated user to create or update their profile.
If the profile exists, it will be updated with the provided details.

response.body:
{
   "success": 1,
   "message": "Profile created successfully",
   "profile": {
      "user_id": 1,
      "user_Number": "1234567890",
      "user_Address": "123 Main St",
      "user_City": "New York",
      "user_State": "NY",
      "user_Country": "USA",
      "user_PinCode": "10001",
      "user_AboutMe": "Hello, I am a developer."
   }
}

request.description:
This endpoint allows an authenticated user to view their profile information.
If the user profile doesn't exist, a message prompting them to create one is returned.

This endpoint allows an authenticated user to update their password. It checks if the old password is correct,
verifies that the new password matches the confirmation password, and updates the password if all checks pass.

This endpoint allows a user to request a password reset by providing their email address.
If the email is valid and belongs to a user with the "user" role, an encrypted token is sent to the email.

This endpoint allows a user to reset their password using a token sent to their email.
The token is validated, and if it has not expired, the user's password is updated.
